text:
e="preserve">Sävsjö BK was a bandy club in Sävsjö in Sweden. It was established in 1971. Jonas Claesson played for the team. He debuted for the team in Division 2 as a 13 years old. At age 14 he switched to Vetlanda BK.
The women's team has played two seasons in the Swedish top division., 1973 and 1974.
